snippet: Investigators have been working in conjunction with the F.B.I. since the eavesdropping allegations surfaced in April.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Louisiana state police investigators find no evidence that the New Orleans Saints or general manager Mickey Loomis rigged the Superdome so that opposing coaches' radio communications could be intercepted; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Investigators have been working in conjunction with the F.B.I. since the eavesdropping allegations surfaced in April.

headline.main: State Police Find No Evidence of Saints Wiretapping
headline.print_headline: State Police Find No Evidence of Saints Wiretapping

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
